narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Guy Clark is a Internal Medicine provider based in Knoxville, TN. From 2018-11 through 2019-08, this provider received $178K in Medicaid payments across 5K claims serving 1K beneficiaries, billing 5 distinct procedure codes.

narrative.title: Key Findings
items: Bills 2.3× the national median for H0047 (H0047), at $187 per claim vs. the median of $81, placing them above the 75th percentile.
Spending grew 2021% from $8K in 2018 to $170K in 2019.
Saw a 21.2× spike in 2019 ($8K → $170K), a sharp year-over-year increase.
Billing stopped in 2019-08, suggesting this provider is no longer active in Medicaid. Abrupt cessation of billing can be a risk indicator.
